com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont

Class BitmapFontPacker.Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker.Configuration
  • Enclosing class:
    BitmapFontPacker

    public static class BitmapFontPacker.Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration of the packing process.
    See Also:
    PixmapPacker, FreeTypeFontGenerator.FreeTypeFontParameter, FreeTypeFontGenerator.Hinting, Texture.TextureFilter

        public java.lang.String name
        The output font name. Default the input file's name.

        public int pageWidth
        Glyph page width. -1 to auto-calculate.

        Glyph page height. -1 to auto-calculate.

        Stretch for height; default to 100%

        The charset; or null/empty for default

        public int size
        The size in pixels

      • mono

        public boolean mono
        If true, font smoothing is disabled.

      • hinting

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.freetype.FreeTypeFontGenerator.Hinting hinting
        Strength of hinting

      • color

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color
        Foreground color (required for non-black borders)

      • gamma

        public float gamma
        Glyph gamma. Values > 1 reduce antialiasing.

      • renderCount

        public int renderCount
        Number of times to render the glyph. Useful with a shadow or border, so it doesn't show through the glyph.

      • borderWidth

        public float borderWidth
        Border width in pixels, 0 to disable

      • borderColor

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color borderColor
        Border color; only used if borderWidth > 0

      • borderStraight

        public boolean borderStraight
        true for straight (mitered), false for rounded borders

      • borderGamma

        public float borderGamma
        Values < 1 increase the border size.

      • shadowOffsetX

        public int shadowOffsetX
        Offset of text shadow on X axis in pixels, 0 to disable

      • shadowOffsetY

        public int shadowOffsetY
        Offset of text shadow on Y axis in pixels, 0 to disable

      • shadowColor

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color shadowColor
        Shadow color; only used if shadowOffset > 0. If alpha component is 0, no shadow is drawn but characters are still offset by shadowOffset.

      • spaceX

        public int spaceX
        Pixels to add to glyph spacing when text is rendered. Can be negative.

      • spaceY

        public int spaceY
        Pixels to add to glyph spacing when text is rendered. Can be negative.

      • padTop

        public int padTop
        Pixels to add to the glyph in the texture. Cannot be negative.

      • padLeft

        public int padLeft
        Pixels to add to the glyph in the texture. Cannot be negative.

      • padBottom

        public int padBottom
        Pixels to add to the glyph in the texture. Cannot be negative.

      • padRight

        public int padRight
        Pixels to add to the glyph in the texture. Cannot be negative.

      • characters

        public java.lang.String characters
        The characters the font should contain. If '\0' is not included then BitmapFont.BitmapFontData#missingGlyph is not set.

      • kerning

        public boolean kerning
        Whether the font should include kerning

      • packer

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.PixmapPacker packer
        The optional PixmapPacker to use for packing multiple fonts into a single texture.
        See Also:
        FreeTypeFontGenerator.FreeTypeFontParameter

      • flip

        public boolean flip
        Whether to flip the font vertically

      • genMipMaps

        public boolean genMipMaps
        Whether to generate mip maps for the resulting texture

      • minFilter

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture.TextureFilter minFilter
        Minification filter

      • magFilter

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture.TextureFilter magFilter
        Magnification filter

      • incremental

        public boolean incremental
        When true, glyphs are rendered on the fly to the font's glyph page textures as they are needed. The FreeTypeFontGenerator must not be disposed until the font is no longer needed. The FreeTypeBitmapFontData must be disposed (separately from the generator) when the font is no longer needed. The FreeTypeFontParameter should not be modified after creating a font. If a PixmapPacker is not specified, the font glyph page textures will use FreeTypeFontGenerator.getMaxTextureSize().
